price: Ko kuwa kamar girgije mai zuba daga sama, a cikinsa akwai duffai da tsãwa da walƙiya: suna sanyãwar yãtsunsu a cikin kunnuwansu dãga tsãwarwakin, dõmin tsõron mutuwa. Kuma Allah Mai kẽwayewane gã kãfirai!
arabic: أَوۡ كَصَيِّبٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَٰتٞ وَرَعۡدٞ وَبَرۡقٞ يَجۡعَلُونَ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِم مِّنَ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقِ حَذَرَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۚ وَٱللَّهُ مُحِيطُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aw kaṣayyibin mina al-samāi fīhi ẓulumātun waraʿdun wabarqun yajʿalūna aṣābiʿahum fī ādhānihim mina al-ṣawāʿiqi ḥadhara al-mawti wal-lahu muḥīṭun bil-kāfirīna
